remarks: Function-builder for derivative: derivative of the identity. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvmptidg.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptidg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvmptidg $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. A |-> x ) ) = ( x e. A |-> 1 ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
